9+ numeric digits required for a number-only password

This Facebook account is not available. Please try a new one

Email Address: Please verify within 15 days

resources.string: Please enter your phone number to log in to WeChat
Log in with a different account
This phone number is already registered. If you continue to sign up, you may not be able to use the WeChat ID previously linked to this phone number.
Enter your password to log in to WeChat
This QQ ID is not registered for WeChat. Do you want to register now?
This phone number is not registered. Do you want to register now?
Your SMS should arrive in %d seconds.
Are you sure you want to cancel and go back?
This QQ ID has registered for WeChat. Please enter your QQ password to log in
Password set. You can log in to WeChat via your email account (%s) and this password.
You have linked your email account: %s. Please set a WeChat login password now.
"You've not set a password for your current ID. Please set a password first and log out again."
Please enter your phone number to receive a message with a password-reset link.
"Request sent. Please check your phone's SMS inbox."
Invalid account or password. Please enter again
You cannot log in to WeChat on your phone with official account. Please go to http://admin.wechat.com to log in.
This email address is not verified. You can only log in with your WeChat ID
Unable to sign up: this is an alpha version. Please try an official-released version.
Unable to log in: this is an beta version. Please try an official-released version.
This is a beta version of WeChat for %s. Please become a beta user first.
Clear all Tencent Weibo private messages
You will not receive new messages if you exit WeChat. Do you want to continue?
Session timeout. Please log in again
Your account has been logged in at another location. Please be aware.
Click the title bar to return to the top
WeChat needs to use Internet service. Please consult your operator for the related service rate.
Can not send a blank message.
Adjust the volume with the volume key
Someone wants to add you as a friend
Recommend QQ contacts who use WeChat
Recommend mobile contacts who use WeChat
Invalid QQ password. Please enter again
This message type is not supported
may be phone number. You can
Unable to delete: this is a preset emoticon
Do you really want to set this ringtone?
You have quit this chat room. Please enter again
You will no longer receive messages from this chat room if you leave.
Images are not supported in Nearby Chat Room.
Images are not supported in Nearby Chat Room.
Do you allow %s to access your location data?
Do you allow %s to access your location data?
WeChat is unable to locate your position. Please go to \"Settings\" -> \"Location\" and enable \"Use wireless networks\" and \"Use GPS satellites\"
Hold a text message with Emoji to add it to your EmoijArt collection.
The email has not been sent yet. Do you really want to cancel?
You have no Tencent Weibo ID
You need to link your QQ ID to continue. Link now?
You have not yet linked your Facebook account. Do you want to link it now?
You have not authorized any Twitter accounts. Do you want to authorize now?
Only Tencent Weibo is supported (begin with \"t.qq.com\").
History data will be cleared when you disable this feature
WeChat will not recommend you to your QQ contacts if this function is disabled
People cannot find you via your WeChat ID if this function is disabled
If set, replying to a stranger will add them to your contact list automatically
People cannot find you via your QQ ID if this function is disabled
People cannot find you via your phone number if this function is disabled
No one can see your Tencent Weibo ID if you choose to disable
You have reached the maximum number of Office Emails that you can add
No one can see your Tencent Weibo ID if you choose to disable
This will not delete any data. You can still log in with this account.
If this is turned off, you will not see a red dot on the Discover icon when your friends share new photos
Set when to play alerts for added feature notices
If disabled, you will not be notified about feature messages. Select Night Mode to block notifications from 22:00-8:00
Disable All Day to limit playing new message notifications to a daily time interval you specify
Changing this option may increase data consumption. Do you really want to change it?

"Keeping WeChat running in the background allows it to receive messages instantly and consumes low data traffic.
To exit WeChat, please go to \"Settings\" -> \"Applications\"."
Traffic data cannot be recovered once deleted. Continue?
Pick a name easy to remember.
Back up your chat history to the server for 7 days
Network connection is needed. Please check network settings.
The existing chat history will be replaced. Want to continue?
Restore backed up chat history from the server
Your address book will be backed up to our servers in an encrypted format.
Visit ic.qq.com on your computer to manage your online address book
The chat history backup will be merged with the chat history on your device
Network connection is needed. Please check network settings.
Unable to restore: your chat history is outdated
You are not using WLAN. The size of your chat history is
. Do you really want to upload?
You are not using WLAN. Do you really want to download?
Do you really want to cancel download?
Do you really want to cancel download?
Do you really want to cancel upload?
"Chat History is only stored for 7 days. Please restore as soon as possible."
The chat history backup has been merged with the chat history on your device
Confirm deleting the uploaded chat history?
Chat history downloaded. Want to restore now?
You can optionally secure your backup with a password
The passwords do not match. Please enter again
Please enter a number with 6-15 digits
Please enter a new password for this account. Setting this password will overwrite any previous passwords.
Password set. You can log in to WeChat with your WeChat ID, linked phone number or email address using this password.
This email address has not been verified. Please log in to your mailbox and verify.
You have unlinked your QQ ID. All QQ related features will no longer be available.
You have not linked your QQ ID.
You must keep at least one unique identifier (e.g. email, phone) linked to your account.
You have unlinked your QQ ID.
You have linked your QQ ID.
This QQ ID has already been linked with another WeChat ID
This phone number has already been linked with another WeChat ID
This email account has already been linked with another WeChat ID
This email is associated with your linked QQ ID. Please try a different email.
Please set your WeChat password first.
Please set your WeChat password first.
Please set your WeChat password first.
You can invite 50 friends at one time at most
Do you want to invite more friends to WeChat?
"6-20 letters, numbers, '_' or '-', must begin with a letter"
WeChat ID: can only be modified once

"WeChat ID can only be modified once. Please confirm:

Add Office Email to find colleagues and save as WeChat contacts.
Maximum number of Office Emails to add has been reached
The following domains are not supported: @qq.com, @gmail.com, @163.com, etc
The email format is incorrect. Please enter again
Email under this domain has been verified
Once verified, your colleagues will be displayed in your WeChat contact list
Confirm deletion of your office mailbox?
No memory card. Only the first 2 background images are available
Please speak out name of the contact
Reply to learn more about the other user
Do you really want to clear all recommendation messages?
Tap here to start voice search
Do you really want to block this person from sending you messages and seeing your posts updates?
This person is now blocked from sending you messages

Clear all cards in Recommend messages
Delete the contact \"%s\" and all associated conversations.
Do you really want to report this user?
WeChat firmly prohibits the sharing of any pornographic, violent, or fraudulent material. We will handle your complaints seriously to ensure a clean social-networking environment.
WeChat firmly prohibits the sharing of any pornographic, violent, or fraudulent material. We will handle your complaints seriously to ensure a clean social-networking environment.
Get QQ Mail messages in WeChat.
If disabled, you will not receive any push mail
Please enter your QQ Mail password
Transfer texts, images, audio and video files between your phone and your PC.
Clear your location data to prevent people from finding you.
Find mobile contacts who have joined WeChat, and push you friend requests from others.

Find QQ contacts who use WeChat.
Receive and reply to QQ messages even when not on QQ

Turn on Online Status on QQ and enable QQ Messages plug-in. Continue?
Send and receive private messages from Tencent Weibo.
Try throwing a bottle to send your message to the world. Or, pick up a bottle to see what someone else has to share.
Record your voice, as well as texts, photos and videos.
You need to link your QQ ID or QQ Mail account to continue. Link now?
View your QQ contacts who have joined WeChat
You must link your QQ ID to continue. Link now?
Deliver a message to many recipients at once. The recipient list will not be disclosed
You can add stars for friends to place them on top of your contact list. Want to add a star for this contact?
Do you want to follow this Official Account?
Do you really want to clear all history related with this app?
Unable to follow: this account has expired.
You can get different kinds of services and information by following WeChat Official Accounts.
You cannot add yourself to your contact list
Share to Tencent Weibo and QQ Private Message

You can save WeChat Name Card to album and send it to friends
The verification may take a while. Please wait...
You have disabled Address Book Matching
Unable to disable Address Book Matching (%d,%d)
Enable Address Book Matching to find phone contacts using WeChat. Your address book data will be encrypted.
"WeChat will send a verification message to your phone and confirm your identity automatically. You don't need to enter any codes."
If you did not receive your SMS verification message, we can tell you your code via phone call.
Call request sent. Please wait for the call and note the verification code.

WeChat does not currently support registration via phone numbers in your region/country

You have not linked your QQ ID yet, so you cannot unlink phone number.
This phone number is not linked
This phone number is linked to another WeChat ID
"Invalid verification code Please check and enter again."
"Verification code expires Go back and reload your verification code."
"Address Book Matching enabled. You can now see your mobile contacts on WeChat. Your phone number: %s"
You can link it again in Settings.
Phone number %s is not verified. Confirm deletion?
Invalid verification code. Please resend the verification code and try again.
This phone number is already registered. If you continue to sign up, you may not be able to use the WeChat ID previously linked to this phone number.
Upload your phone address book to find more friends on WeChat.
"Are you sure you don't want add any of your contacts?"

WeChat will access the contacts stored on your device so that you can see which of your friends are already using WeChat. If any of your contacts are not using WeChat, you can choose to have WeChat send an invitation to join via SMS. Please only select contacts you know will want to receive an invitation. We will handle your contact information in accordance with our Privacy Policy.

WeChat will access the contacts stored on your device so that you can see which of your friends are already using WeChat. We will handle your contact information in accordance with our Privacy Policy.
WeChat will access the contacts stored on your device. Your contacts data will be encrypted.
When you tap OK, we will send one SMS to each of the friends that you have selected. Please note that we are contacting such friends only on your behalf and you consent to us making such contact.
We will send friend requests to your selected contacts who use WeChat.
Link your QQ ID to find QQ contacts on WeChat. With your QQ ID linked, you can use features like QQ Messages and QQ Mail.
Invalid account or password. Please enter again.
This QQ ID is linked to another WeChat ID. Please try a new one.
This QQ ID has expired. Please renew or change to another one.
Unable to link this QQ ID. Please try another one.
You have linked your QQ ID and can use related features to find more friends.

"If you unlink your QQ ID, all history data for QQ-related features will be deleted and your QQ info will no longer be shown on your profile page, QR Name Card, or privacy settings page. You will not be able to log in to WeChat via this QQ ID."

"The price you will pay for your purchase is a fixed price denominated in Renminbi, the currency of the People's Republic of China (\"RMB\").

You have not been informed of the actual RMB price for your purchase. Instead, you have been informed of an approximate value in US dollars (\"USD\") of the actual RMB price. The approximate USD price uses historical, not real-time, currency exchange rates.

The bank card you will use to pay for your purchase is unlikely to be denominated in RMB.

You will not be charged the approximate USD price for your purchase. The amount you will be charged will be your local currency equivalent (as determined by your bank card issuer) of the actual RMB price.

Your bank card issuer may also charge you other fees for you making a purchase in RMB rather than your local currency.

For further details, please click here ."
